column4: Anyone here able to help finish the configuration of a pastebot that was written in perl, thats running on Ubuntu breezy? the only issue I have left is the one where the bot has the dropdown box, where you choose the channel it pastes the link into.
the dropdown box currently has only (none) in it
it's "sudo" as short for su, switch user, not superuser. and if you do "su" with no user name, it assumes root
